allow:
Bash(# Experience levels (column 2)
echo ""=== EXPERIENCE LEVELS ===""
cut -d'','' -f2 data/ds_salaries.csv | sort | uniq -c | sort -nr

echo -e ""\n=== EMPLOYMENT TYPES ===""
# Employment types (column 3)
cut -d'','' -f3 data/ds_salaries.csv | sort | uniq -c | sort -nr

echo -e ""\n=== COMPANY SIZES ===""
# Company sizes (column 11)
cut -d'','' -f11 data/ds_salaries.csv | sort | uniq -c | sort -nr)

Bash(# Job titles (column 4)
echo ""=== JOB TITLES ===""
cut -d'','' -f4 data/ds_salaries.csv | grep -v ""job_title"" | sort | uniq -c | sort -nr

echo -e ""\n=== TOP 20 JOB TITLES ===""
cut -d'','' -f4 data/ds_salaries.csv | grep -v ""job_title"" | sort | uniq -c | sort -nr | head -20)

Bash(# Company locations (column 10)
echo ""=== COMPANY LOCATIONS ===""
cut -d'','' -f10 data/ds_salaries.csv | grep -v ""company_location"" | sort | uniq -c | sort -nr

echo -e ""\n=== TOP 20 COMPANY LOCATIONS ===""
cut -d'','' -f10 data/ds_salaries.csv | grep -v ""company_location"" | sort | uniq -c | sort -nr | head -20)

Bash(# Work years and remote ratios
echo ""=== WORK YEARS ===""
cut -d'','' -f1 data/ds_salaries.csv | grep -v ""work_year"" | sort | uniq -c | sort -nr

echo -e ""\n=== REMOTE RATIOS ===""
cut -d'','' -f9 data/ds_salaries.csv | grep -v ""remote_ratio"" | sort | uniq -c | sort -nr)
